The story takes place during a time period known as "the year before Voldemort returned" or simply "the year of Harry Potter". The movie follows the journey of two young characters named Harry Potter and Hermione Granger, who are attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The story revolves around their quest to find out who was behind all the evil things that were happening in Hogwarts School. They also have to face many challenges and obstacles on their way to find out who was behind all the evil things that were happening in Hogwarts School.
